text:
Hi Krittiya, thanks for the question! Not 100% sure here, but does your theme include layout.css from the boilerplate? That file can be found here:

<https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-theme-boilerplate/blob/main/src/css/objects/_layout.css>
Also, I believe the dnd_column should be inside the dnd_row (and not the other way around)
Thanks, Ben! Yes, include the layout.css solved the issue.
